#find_package(Perl REQUIRED)
find_package(PerlLibs REQUIRED)

IF (NOT PERLLIBS_FOUND)
  MESSAGE(FATAL_ERROR "PerlLibs was not found, you need to install it, on openSUSE, I use sudo zypper install R-core R-base  R-core-devel R-base-devel")
ENDIF ()


INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES(${PERL_INCLUDE_PATH})

SET (module gvxrPerl)


configure_file(../gvxrWrapper-doc.in ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/gvxrPerl.i)
SET_PROPERTY(SOURCE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/gvxrPerl.i PROPERTY CPLUSPLUS ON)

# Add swig module
IF(${CMAKE_VERSION} VERSION_LESS "3.8.0")
    SWIG_ADD_MODULE(${module} perl ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/${module}.i)
ELSE (${CMAKE_VERSION} VERSION_LESS "3.8.0")
    SWIG_ADD_LIBRARY(${module} LANGUAGE perl SOURCES ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/${module}.i)
ENDIF (${CMAKE_VERSION} VERSION_LESS "3.8.0")

set_property(
    SOURCE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/${module}.i
    PROPERTY SWIG_MODULE_NAME ${module})

swig_link_libraries(${module} ${SimpleGVXR_LIBRARY} ${SimpleGVXR_LIBRARIES} ${PERL_LIBRARY})

IF (USE_SUPERBUILD)
    ADD_DEPENDENCIES(${module} SimpleGVXR)
ENDIF ()

configure_file(test.pl.in ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/${CMAKE_FILES_DIRECTORY}/test.pl)
FILE(COPY ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/${CMAKE_FILES_DIRECTORY}/test.pl
		DESTINATION ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}
		FILE_PERMISSIONS OWNER_READ OWNER_WRITE OWNER_EXECUTE GROUP_READ
  			GROUP_EXECUTE WORLD_READ WORLD_EXECUTE)

FILE(COPY ../welsh-dragon-small.stl DESTINATION ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR})

FILE(COPY runPerlTest.sh
		DESTINATION ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}
		FILE_PERMISSIONS OWNER_READ OWNER_WRITE OWNER_EXECUTE GROUP_READ
  			GROUP_EXECUTE WORLD_READ WORLD_EXECUTE)


install(FILES
    ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/${module}.pm
    DESTINATION ${CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX}/${INSTALL_DIR}/perl
    COMPONENT Perl)

install(FILES
    ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/test.pl
    DESTINATION ${CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX}/${INSTALL_DIR}/perl
    PERMISSIONS OWNER_READ OWNER_WRITE OWNER_EXECUTE GROUP_READ GROUP_EXECUTE WORLD_READ WORLD_EXECUTE
    COMPONENT Demos)

IF (UNIX)
    install(FILES
        ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/${module}.so
        DESTINATION ${CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX}/${INSTALL_DIR}/perl
        PERMISSIONS OWNER_READ OWNER_WRITE OWNER_EXECUTE GROUP_READ GROUP_EXECUTE WORLD_READ WORLD_EXECUTE
        COMPONENT Perl)

    install(FILES
        ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/runPerlTest.sh
        DESTINATION ${CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX}/${INSTALL_DIR}/perl
        PERMISSIONS OWNER_READ OWNER_WRITE OWNER_EXECUTE GROUP_READ GROUP_EXECUTE WORLD_READ WORLD_EXECUTE
        COMPONENT Demos)
ENDIF (UNIX)

SET (CPACK_COMPONENTS_ALL ${CPACK_COMPONENTS_ALL}  Perl PARENT_SCOPE)
